title: [Tournament] Hash1Gaming: February Fatality

embed.description: Hey everyone, We're happy to announce that thanks to our newest sponsor KongComputers, we're able to officially announce our 5v5 Tournament for February 2015! Before joining our tournament, here's some information about how we'll be doing it: Registrations are open to both free agents and formed teams. Each team must consist of no less...

body:
Hey everyone,

My name is Tom and I'm the general manager of Hash One Gaming. We're glad to announce that we're hosting our first League of Legends 5v5 Tournament in 2015 during February!
This tournament is a basic 5v5 Tournament Draft on Summoners Rift. Players/teams of all skill (except professional teams) are permitted to join, so whether you're a group of friends or just a solo queue player looking for some fun - you've got the chance to join! 
Thanks to Battlefy, we're accepting registrations for both free-agents and pre-formed teams! If you're a free agent, you'll be placed with 4 other free agents one week prior to the tournament start. From there, you'll be able to practice as a team. 

Our prizes can be found on the registration page.
Our rules can be found on the registration page.

We've opened registrations to the public, so what are you waiting for? Sign up for the chance to earn some prizes and have a great week playing League of Legends!

If you've got any questions, feel free to message email us at admin[@]hash1gaming.com
